00043 static void recount_totsels(BMesh *bm)
00044 {
00045     BMIter iter;
00046     BMElem *ele;
00047     const char iter_types[3] = {BM_VERTS_OF_MESH,
00048                                 BM_EDGES_OF_MESH,
00049                                 BM_FACES_OF_MESH};
00050     int *tots[3];
00051     int i;
00052 
00053     /* recount (tot * sel) variables */
00054     bm->totvertsel = bm->totedgesel = bm->totfacesel = 0;
00055     tots[0] = &bm->totvertsel;
00056     tots[1] = &bm->totedgesel;
00057     tots[2] = &bm->totfacesel;
00058 
00059     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00060         ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, iter_types[i], NULL);
00061         for ( ; ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00062             if (BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) *tots[i] += 1;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00074 void BM_mesh_select_mode_flush(BMesh *bm)
00075 {
00076     BMEdge *e;
00077     BMLoop *l_iter;
00078     BMLoop *l_first;
00079     BMFace *f;
00080 
00081     BMIter eiter;
00082     BMIter fiter;
00083 
00084     int ok;
00085 
00086     if (bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00087         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00088             if (BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00089                 BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00090                 !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
00091             {
00092                 BM_elem_flag_enable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00093             }
00094             else {
00095                 BM_elem_flag_disable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00096             }
00097         }
00098         BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00099             ok = TRUE;
00100             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00101                 l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00102                 do {
00103                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00104                         ok = FALSE;
00105                         break;
00106                     }
00107                 } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00108             }
00109             else {
00110                 ok = FALSE;
00111             }
00112 
00113             BM_elem_flag_set(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT, ok);
00114         }
00115     }
00116     else if (bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00117         BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00118             ok = TRUE;
00119             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00120                 l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00121                 do {
00122                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->e, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00123                         ok = FALSE;
00124                         break;
00125                     }
00126                 } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00127             }
00128             else {
00129                 ok = FALSE;
00130             }
00131 
00132             BM_elem_flag_set(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT, ok);
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     /* Remove any deselected elements from the BMEditSelection */
00137     BM_select_history_validate(bm);
00138 
00139     recount_totsels(bm);
00140 }
00141 
00145 void BM_mesh_deselect_flush(BMesh *bm)
00146 {
00147     BMEdge *e;
00148     BMLoop *l_iter;
00149     BMLoop *l_first;
00150     BMFace *f;
00151 
00152     BMIter eiter;
00153     BMIter fiter;
00154 
00155     int ok;
00156 
00157     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00158         if (!(BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00159               BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00160               !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)))
00161         {
00162             BM_elem_flag_disable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00167         ok = TRUE;
00168         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00169             l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00170             do {
00171                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00172                     ok = FALSE;
00173                     break;
00174                 }
00175             } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00176         }
00177         else {
00178             ok = FALSE;
00179         }
00180 
00181         if (ok == FALSE) {
00182             BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186     /* Remove any deselected elements from the BMEditSelection */
00187     BM_select_history_validate(bm);
00188 
00189     recount_totsels(bm);
00190 }

00196 void BM_mesh_select_flush(BMesh *bm)
00197 {
00198     BMEdge *e;
00199     BMLoop *l_iter;
00200     BMLoop *l_first;
00201     BMFace *f;
00202 
00203     BMIter eiter;
00204     BMIter fiter;
00205 
00206     int ok;
00207 
00208     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &eiter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00209         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00210             BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00211             !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
00212         {
00213             BM_elem_flag_enable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00214         }
00215     }
00216 
00217     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00218         ok = TRUE;
00219         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00220             l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00221             do {
00222                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00223                     ok = FALSE;
00224                     break;
00225                 }
00226             } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00227         }
00228         else {
00229             ok = FALSE;
00230         }
00231 
00232         if (ok) {
00233             BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00237     recount_totsels(bm);
00238 }

00246 void BM_vert_select_set(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, int select)
00247 {
00248     BLI_assert(v->head.htype == BM_VERT);
00249 
00250     if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00251         return;
00252     }
00253 
00254     if (select) {
00255         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00256             bm->totvertsel += 1;
00257             BM_elem_flag_enable(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00258         }
00259     }
00260     else {
00261         if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00262             bm->totvertsel -= 1;
00263             BM_elem_flag_disable(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00264         }
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00273 void BM_edge_select_set(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e, int select)
00274 {
00275     BLI_assert(e->head.htype == BM_EDGE);
00276 
00277     if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00278         return;
00279     }
00280 
00281     if (select) {
00282         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) bm->totedgesel += 1;
00283 
00284         BM_elem_flag_enable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00285         BM_vert_select_set(bm, e->v1, TRUE);
00286         BM_vert_select_set(bm, e->v2, TRUE);
00287     }
00288     else {
00289         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) bm->totedgesel -= 1;
00290         BM_elem_flag_disable(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00291 
00292         if (bm->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_EDGE ||
00293             bm->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE ||
00294             bm->selectmode == (SCE_SELECT_EDGE | SCE_SELECT_FACE))
00295         {
00296 
00297             BMIter iter;
00298             BMVert *verts[2] = {e->v1, e->v2};
00299             BMEdge *e2;
00300             int i;
00301 
00302             for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00303                 int deselect = 1;
00304 
00305                 for (e2 = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT, verts[i]); e2; e2 = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00306                     if (e2 == e) {
00307                         continue;
00308                     }
00309 
00310                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(e2, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00311                         deselect = 0;
00312                         break;
00313                     }
00314                 }
00315 
00316                 if (deselect) {
00317                     BM_vert_select_set(bm, verts[i], FALSE);
00318                 }
00319             }
00320         }
00321         else {
00322             BM_vert_select_set(bm, e->v1, FALSE);
00323             BM_vert_select_set(bm, e->v2, FALSE);
00324         }
00325 
00326     }
00327 }
00328 
00335 void BM_face_select_set(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, int select)
00336 {
00337     BMLoop *l_iter;
00338     BMLoop *l_first;
00339 
00340     BLI_assert(f->head.htype == BM_FACE);
00341 
00342     if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00343         return;
00344     }
00345 
00346     if (select) {
00347         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00348             bm->totfacesel++;
00349         }
00350 
00351         BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00352         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00353         do {
00354             BM_vert_select_set(bm, l_iter->v, TRUE);
00355             BM_edge_select_set(bm, l_iter->e, TRUE);
00356         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00357     }
00358     else {
00359         BMIter liter;
00360         BMLoop *l;
00361 
00362         if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) bm->totfacesel -= 1;
00363         BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00364 
00365         /* flush down to edges */
00366         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00367             BMIter fiter;
00368             BMFace *f2;
00369             BM_ITER_ELEM (f2, &fiter, l->e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00370                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(f2, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
00371                     break;
00372             }
00373 
00374             if (!f2) {
00375                 BM_edge_select_set(bm, l->e, FALSE);
00376             }
00377         }
00378 
00379         /* flush down to verts */
00380         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00381             BMIter eiter;
00382             BMEdge *e;
00383             BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, l->v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00384                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
00385                     break;
00386             }
00387 
00388             if (!e) {
00389                 BM_vert_select_set(bm, l->v, FALSE);
00390             }
00391         }
00392     }
00393 }
00394 
00401 void BM_mesh_select_mode_set(BMesh *bm, int selectmode)
00402 {
00403     BMIter iter;
00404     BMElem *ele;
00405     
00406     bm->selectmode = selectmode;
00407 
00408     if (bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00409         /* disabled because selection flushing handles these */
00410 #if 0
00411         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00412             BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00413         }
00414         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00415             BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00416         }
00417 #endif
00418         BM_mesh_select_mode_flush(bm);
00419     }
00420     else if (bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00421         /* disabled because selection flushing handles these */
00422 #if 0
00423         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00424             BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00425         }
00426 #endif
00427 
00428         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00429             if (BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00430                 BM_edge_select_set(bm, (BMEdge *)ele, TRUE);
00431             }
00432         }
00433         BM_mesh_select_mode_flush(bm);
00434     }
00435     else if (bm->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
00436         /* disabled because selection flushing handles these */
00437 #if 0
00438         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00439             BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00440         }
00441 #endif
00442         BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00443             if (BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00444                 BM_face_select_set(bm, (BMFace *)ele, TRUE);
00445             }
00446         }
00447         BM_mesh_select_mode_flush(bm);
00448     }
00449 }
00450 
00454 static int bm_mesh_flag_count(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag,
00455                               const short respecthide, const short test_for_enabled)
00456 {
00457     BMElem *ele;
00458     BMIter iter;
00459     int tot = 0;
00460 
00461     BLI_assert(ELEM(TRUE, FALSE, test_for_enabled));
00462 
00463     if (htype & BM_VERT) {
00464         for (ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL); ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00465             if (respecthide && BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) continue;
00466             if (BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled) tot++;
00467         }
00468     }
00469     if (htype & BM_EDGE) {
00470         for (ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL); ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00471             if (respecthide && BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) continue;
00472             if (BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled) tot++;
00473         }
00474     }
00475     if (htype & BM_FACE) {
00476         for (ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL); ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00477             if (respecthide && BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) continue;
00478             if (BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled) tot++;
00479         }
00480     }
00481 
00482     return tot;
00483 }
00484 
00485 int BM_mesh_elem_hflag_count_enabled(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag, int respecthide)
00486 {
00487     return bm_mesh_flag_count(bm, htype, hflag, respecthide, TRUE);
00488 }
00489 
00490 int BM_mesh_elem_hflag_count_disabled(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag, int respecthide)
00491 {
00492     return bm_mesh_flag_count(bm, htype, hflag, respecthide, FALSE);
00493 }

00499 void BM_elem_select_set(BMesh *bm, BMElem *ele, int select)
00500 {
00501     switch (ele->head.htype) {
00502         case BM_VERT:
00503             BM_vert_select_set(bm, (BMVert *)ele, select);
00504             break;
00505         case BM_EDGE:
00506             BM_edge_select_set(bm, (BMEdge *)ele, select);
00507             break;
00508         case BM_FACE:
00509             BM_face_select_set(bm, (BMFace *)ele, select);
00510             break;
00511         default:
00512             BLI_assert(0);
00513             break;
00514     }
00515 }

00517 /* this replaces the active flag used in uv/face mode */
00518 void BM_active_face_set(BMesh *bm, BMFace *efa)
00519 {
00520     bm->act_face = efa;
00521 }
00522 
00523 BMFace *BM_active_face_get(BMesh *bm, int sloppy)
00524 {
00525     if (bm->act_face) {
00526         return bm->act_face;
00527     }
00528     else if (sloppy) {
00529         BMIter iter;
00530         BMFace *f = NULL;
00531         BMEditSelection *ese;
00532         
00533         /* Find the latest non-hidden face from the BMEditSelection */
00534         ese = bm->selected.last;
00535         for ( ; ese; ese = ese->prev) {
00536             if (ese->htype == BM_FACE) {
00537                 f = (BMFace *)ese->ele;
00538                 
00539                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00540                     f = NULL;
00541                 }
00542                 else {
00543                     break;
00544                 }
00545             }
00546         }
00547         /* Last attempt: try to find any selected face */
00548         if (f == NULL) {
00549             BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00550                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00551                     break;
00552                 }
00553             }
00554         }
00555         return f; /* can still be null */
00556     }
00557     return NULL;
00558 }
00559 
00569 void BM_editselection_center(BMEditSelection *ese, float r_center[3])
00570 {
00571     if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
00572         BMVert *eve = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00573         copy_v3_v3(r_center, eve->co);
00574     }
00575     else if (ese->htype == BM_EDGE) {
00576         BMEdge *eed = (BMEdge *)ese->ele;
00577         add_v3_v3v3(r_center, eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
00578         mul_v3_fl(r_center, 0.5);
00579     }
00580     else if (ese->htype == BM_FACE) {
00581         BMFace *efa = (BMFace *)ese->ele;
00582         BM_face_calc_center_bounds(efa, r_center);
00583     }
00584 }
00585 
00586 void BM_editselection_normal(BMEditSelection *ese, float r_normal[3])
00587 {
00588     if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
00589         BMVert *eve = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00590         copy_v3_v3(r_normal, eve->no);
00591     }
00592     else if (ese->htype == BM_EDGE) {
00593         BMEdge *eed = (BMEdge *)ese->ele;
00594         float plane[3]; /* need a plane to correct the normal */
00595         float vec[3]; /* temp vec storage */
00596         
00597         add_v3_v3v3(r_normal, eed->v1->no, eed->v2->no);
00598         sub_v3_v3v3(plane, eed->v2->co, eed->v1->co);
00599         
00600         /* the 2 vertex normals will be close but not at rightangles to the edge
00601          * for rotate about edge we want them to be at right angles, so we need to
00602          * do some extra colculation to correct the vert normals,
00603          * we need the plane for this */
00604         cross_v3_v3v3(vec, r_normal, plane);
00605         cross_v3_v3v3(r_normal, plane, vec);
00606         normalize_v3(r_normal);
00607         
00608     }
00609     else if (ese->htype == BM_FACE) {
00610         BMFace *efa = (BMFace *)ese->ele;
00611         copy_v3_v3(r_normal, efa->no);
00612     }
00613 }
00614 
00615 /* ref - editmesh_lib.cL:EM_editselection_plane() */
00616 
00617 /* Calculate a plane that is rightangles to the edge/vert/faces normal
00618  * also make the plane run along an axis that is related to the geometry,
00619  * because this is used for the manipulators Y axis. */
00620 void BM_editselection_plane(BMEditSelection *ese, float r_plane[3])
00621 {
00622     if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
00623         BMVert *eve = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00624         float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00625         
00626         if (ese->prev) { /* use previously selected data to make a useful vertex plane */
00627             BM_editselection_center(ese->prev, vec);
00628             sub_v3_v3v3(r_plane, vec, eve->co);
00629         }
00630         else {
00631             /* make a fake  plane thats at rightangles to the normal
00632              * we cant make a crossvec from a vec thats the same as the vec
00633              * unlikely but possible, so make sure if the normal is (0, 0, 1)
00634              * that vec isn't the same or in the same direction even. */
00635             if      (eve->no[0] < 0.5f) vec[0] = 1.0f;
00636             else if (eve->no[1] < 0.5f) vec[1] = 1.0f;
00637             else                        vec[2] = 1.0f;
00638             cross_v3_v3v3(r_plane, eve->no, vec);
00639         }
00640     }
00641     else if (ese->htype == BM_EDGE) {
00642         BMEdge *eed = (BMEdge *)ese->ele;
00643 
00644         /* the plane is simple, it runs along the edge
00645          * however selecting different edges can swap the direction of the y axis.
00646          * this makes it less likely for the y axis of the manipulator
00647          * (running along the edge).. to flip less often.
00648          * at least its more predictable */
00649         if (eed->v2->co[1] > eed->v1->co[1]) {  /* check which to do first */
00650             sub_v3_v3v3(r_plane, eed->v2->co, eed->v1->co);
00651         }
00652         else {
00653             sub_v3_v3v3(r_plane, eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
00654         }
00655         
00656     }
00657     else if (ese->htype == BM_FACE) {
00658         BMFace *efa = (BMFace *)ese->ele;
00659         float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00660         
00661         /* for now, use face normal */
00662 
00663         /* make a fake plane thats at rightangles to the normal
00664          * we cant make a crossvec from a vec thats the same as the vec
00665          * unlikely but possible, so make sure if the normal is (0, 0, 1)
00666          * that vec isn't the same or in the same direction even. */
00667         if (efa->len < 3) {
00668             /* crappy fallback method */
00669             if      (efa->no[0] < 0.5f) vec[0] = 1.0f;
00670             else if (efa->no[1] < 0.5f) vec[1] = 1.0f;
00671             else                        vec[2] = 1.0f;
00672             cross_v3_v3v3(r_plane, efa->no, vec);
00673         }
00674         else {
00675             BMVert *verts[4] = {NULL};
00676 
00677             BM_iter_as_array(NULL, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE, efa, (void **)verts, 4);
00678 
00679             if (efa->len == 4) {
00680                 float vecA[3], vecB[3];
00681                 sub_v3_v3v3(vecA, verts[3]->co, verts[2]->co);
00682                 sub_v3_v3v3(vecB, verts[0]->co, verts[1]->co);
00683                 add_v3_v3v3(r_plane, vecA, vecB);
00684 
00685                 sub_v3_v3v3(vecA, verts[0]->co, verts[3]->co);
00686                 sub_v3_v3v3(vecB, verts[1]->co, verts[2]->co);
00687                 add_v3_v3v3(vec, vecA, vecB);
00688                 /* use the biggest edge length */
00689                 if (dot_v3v3(r_plane, r_plane) < dot_v3v3(vec, vec)) {
00690                     copy_v3_v3(r_plane, vec);
00691                 }
00692             }
00693             else {
00694                 /* BMESH_TODO (not urgent, use longest ngon edge for alignment) */
00695 
00696                 /* start with v1-2 */
00697                 sub_v3_v3v3(r_plane, verts[0]->co, verts[1]->co);
00698 
00699                 /* test the edge between v2-3, use if longer */
00700                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec, verts[1]->co, verts[2]->co);
00701                 if (dot_v3v3(r_plane, r_plane) < dot_v3v3(vec, vec))
00702                     copy_v3_v3(r_plane, vec);
00703 
00704                 /* test the edge between v1-3, use if longer */
00705                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec, verts[2]->co, verts[0]->co);
00706                 if (dot_v3v3(r_plane, r_plane) < dot_v3v3(vec, vec)) {
00707                     copy_v3_v3(r_plane, vec);
00708                 }
00709             }
00710 
00711         }
00712     }
00713     normalize_v3(r_plane);
00714 }
00715 
00716 
00717 /* --- macro wrapped funcs --- */
00718 int _bm_select_history_check(BMesh *bm, const BMHeader *ele)
00719 {
00720     BMEditSelection *ese;
00721     
00722     for (ese = bm->selected.first; ese; ese = ese->next) {
00723         if (ese->ele == (BMElem *)ele) {
00724             return TRUE;
00725         }
00726     }
00727     
00728     return FALSE;
00729 }
00730 
00731 int _bm_select_history_remove(BMesh *bm, BMHeader *ele)
00732 {
00733     BMEditSelection *ese;
00734     for (ese = bm->selected.first; ese; ese = ese->next) {
00735         if (ese->ele == (BMElem *)ele) {
00736             BLI_freelinkN(&(bm->selected), ese);
00737             return TRUE;
00738         }
00739     }
00740 
00741     return FALSE;
00742 }
00743 
00744 void _bm_select_history_store_notest(BMesh *bm, BMHeader *ele)
00745 {
00746     BMEditSelection *ese = (BMEditSelection *) MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMEditSelection), "BMEdit Selection");
00747     ese->htype = ele->htype;
00748     ese->ele = (BMElem *)ele;
00749     BLI_addtail(&(bm->selected), ese);
00750 }
00751 
00752 void _bm_select_history_store(BMesh *bm, BMHeader *ele)
00753 {
00754     if (!BM_select_history_check(bm, (BMElem *)ele)) {
00755         BM_select_history_store_notest(bm, (BMElem *)ele);
00756     }
00757 }
00758 /* --- end macro wrapped funcs --- */
00759 
00760 
00761 void BM_select_history_clear(BMesh *bm)
00762 {
00763     BLI_freelistN(&bm->selected);
00764     bm->selected.first = bm->selected.last = NULL;
00765 }
00766 
00767 
00768 void BM_select_history_validate(BMesh *bm)
00769 {
00770     BMEditSelection *ese, *nextese;
00771 
00772     ese = bm->selected.first;
00773 
00774     while (ese) {
00775         nextese = ese->next;
00776         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(ese->ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00777             BLI_freelinkN(&(bm->selected), ese);
00778         }
00779         ese = nextese;
00780     }
00781 }
00782 
00783 /* utility function */
00784 int BM_select_history_active_get(BMesh *bm, BMEditSelection *ese)
00785 {
00786     BMEditSelection *ese_last = bm->selected.last;
00787     BMFace *efa = BM_active_face_get(bm, FALSE);
00788 
00789     ese->next = ese->prev = NULL;
00790 
00791     if (ese_last) {
00792         if (ese_last->htype == BM_FACE) { /* if there is an active face, use it over the last selected face */
00793             if (efa) {
00794                 ese->ele = (BMElem *)efa;
00795             }
00796             else {
00797                 ese->ele = ese_last->ele;
00798             }
00799             ese->htype = BM_FACE;
00800         }
00801         else {
00802             ese->ele =   ese_last->ele;
00803             ese->htype = ese_last->htype;
00804         }
00805     }
00806     else if (efa) { /* no */
00807         ese->ele   = (BMElem *)efa;
00808         ese->htype = BM_FACE;
00809     }
00810     else {
00811         ese->ele = NULL;
00812         return FALSE;
00813     }
00814 
00815     return TRUE;
00816 }
00817 
00818 void BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_test(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag,
00819                                      int respecthide, const char hflag_test)
00820 {
00821     const char iter_types[3] = {BM_VERTS_OF_MESH,
00822                                 BM_EDGES_OF_MESH,
00823                                 BM_FACES_OF_MESH};
00824 
00825     const char flag_types[3] = {BM_VERT, BM_EDGE, BM_FACE};
00826 
00827     BMIter iter;
00828     BMElem *ele;
00829     int i;
00830 
00831     if (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT) {
00832         BM_select_history_clear(bm);
00833     }
00834 
00835     if ((htype == (BM_VERT | BM_EDGE | BM_FACE)) &&
00836         (hflag == BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
00837         (respecthide == FALSE) &&
00838         (hflag_test == 0))
00839     {
00840         /* fast path for deselect all, avoid topology loops
00841          * since we know all will be de-selected anyway. */
00842         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00843             ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, iter_types[i], NULL);
00844             for ( ; ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00845                 BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00846             }
00847         }
00848         bm->totvertsel = bm->totedgesel = bm->totfacesel = 0;
00849     }
00850     else {
00851         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00852             if (htype & flag_types[i]) {
00853                 ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, iter_types[i], NULL);
00854                 for ( ; ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00855 
00856                     if (respecthide && BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00857                         continue;
00858                     }
00859                     if (hflag_test && !BM_elem_flag_test(ele, hflag_test)) {
00860                         continue;
00861                     }
00862 
00863                     if (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT) {
00864                         BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, FALSE);
00865                     }
00866                     BM_elem_flag_disable(ele, hflag);
00867                 }
00868             }
00869         }
00870     }
00871 }
00872 
00873 void BM_mesh_elem_hflag_enable_test(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag,
00874                                     int respecthide, const char hflag_test)
00875 {
00876     const char iter_types[3] = {BM_VERTS_OF_MESH,
00877                                 BM_EDGES_OF_MESH,
00878                                 BM_FACES_OF_MESH};
00879 
00880     const char flag_types[3] = {BM_VERT, BM_EDGE, BM_FACE};
00881 
00882     /* use the nosel version when setting so under no
00883      * condition may a hidden face become selected.
00884      * Applying other flags to hidden faces is OK. */
00885     const char hflag_nosel = hflag & ~BM_ELEM_SELECT;
00886 
00887     BMIter iter;
00888     BMElem *ele;
00889     int i;
00890 
00891     if (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT) {
00892         BM_select_history_clear(bm);
00893     }
00894 
00895     /* note, better not attempt a fast path for selection as done with de-select
00896      * because hidden geometry and different selection modes can give different results,
00897      * we could of course check for no hiddent faces and then use quicker method but its not worth it. */
00898 
00899     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00900         if (htype & flag_types[i]) {
00901             ele = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, iter_types[i], NULL);
00902             for ( ; ele; ele = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00903 
00904                 if (respecthide && BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00905                     continue;
00906                 }
00907                 if (hflag_test && !BM_elem_flag_test(ele, hflag_test)) {
00908                     continue;
00909                 }
00910 
00911                 if (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT) {
00912                     BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, TRUE);
00913                 }
00914                 BM_elem_flag_enable(ele, hflag_nosel);
00915             }
00916         }
00917     }
00918 }
00919 
00920 void BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_all(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag,
00921                                     int respecthide)
00922 {
00923     /* call with 0 hflag_test */
00924     BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_test(bm, htype, hflag, respecthide, 0);
00925 }
00926 
00927 void BM_mesh_elem_hflag_enable_all(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const char hflag,
00928                                    int respecthide)
00929 {
00930     /* call with 0 hflag_test */
00931     BM_mesh_elem_hflag_enable_test(bm, htype, hflag, respecthide, 0);
00932 }
00933 
00934 /***************** Mesh Hiding stuff *********** */
00935 
00936 static void vert_flush_hide_set(BMVert *v)
00937 {
00938     BMIter iter;
00939     BMEdge *e;
00940     int hide = TRUE;
00941 
00942     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &iter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00943         hide = hide && BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN);
00944     }
00945 
00946     BM_elem_flag_set(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00947 }
00948 
00949 static void edge_flush_hide(BMEdge *e)
00950 {
00951     BMIter iter;
00952     BMFace *f;
00953     int hide = TRUE;
00954 
00955     BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &iter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00956         hide = hide && BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN);
00957     }
00958 
00959     BM_elem_flag_set(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00960 }
00961 
00962 void BM_vert_hide_set(BMVert *v, int hide)
00963 {
00964     /* vert hiding: vert + surrounding edges and faces */
00965     BMIter iter, fiter;
00966     BMEdge *e;
00967     BMFace *f;
00968 
00969     BM_elem_flag_set(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00970 
00971     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &iter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00972         BM_elem_flag_set(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00973 
00974         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00975             BM_elem_flag_set(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00976         }
00977     }
00978 }
00979 
00980 void BM_edge_hide_set(BMEdge *e, int hide)
00981 {
00982     BMIter iter;
00983     BMFace *f;
00984     /* BMVert *v; */
00985 
00986     /* edge hiding: faces around the edge */
00987     BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &iter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00988         BM_elem_flag_set(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00989     }
00990     
00991     BM_elem_flag_set(e, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
00992 
00993     /* hide vertices if necessary */
00994     vert_flush_hide_set(e->v1);
00995     vert_flush_hide_set(e->v2);
00996 }
00997 
00998 void BM_face_hide_set(BMFace *f, int hide)
00999 {
01000     BMIter iter;
01001     BMLoop *l;
01002 
01003     BM_elem_flag_set(f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN, hide);
01004 
01005     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01006         edge_flush_hide(l->e);
01007     }
01008 
01009     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01010         vert_flush_hide_set(l->v);
01011     }
01012 }
01013 
01014 void _bm_elem_hide_set(BMesh *bm, BMHeader *head, int hide)
01015 {
01016     /* Follow convention of always deselecting before
01017      * hiding an element */
01018     switch (head->htype) {
01019         case BM_VERT:
01020             if (hide) BM_vert_select_set(bm, (BMVert *)head, FALSE);
01021             BM_vert_hide_set((BMVert *)head, hide);
01022             break;
01023         case BM_EDGE:
01024             if (hide) BM_edge_select_set(bm, (BMEdge *)head, FALSE);
01025             BM_edge_hide_set((BMEdge *)head, hide);
01026             break;
01027         case BM_FACE:
01028             if (hide) BM_face_select_set(bm, (BMFace *)head, FALSE);
01029             BM_face_hide_set((BMFace *)head, hide);
01030             break;
01031         default:
01032             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
01033             break;
01034     }
01035 }
